text: Jesús Hermida Pineda (27 June 1947 - 4 May 2015) was a Spanish journalist. He worked as a U.S. correspondent for Televisión Española in New York City. Hermida was born in Ayamonte, Huelva. Hermida died from a stroke in Madrid at the age of 77. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Spanish journalists Category:People from Andalusia
title: Jesús Hermida
